description: This file contains utility functions for handling agent sessions, workflows, teams, and tools within a larger AI or automation framework. It includes functions for formatting tools, retrieving entities by ID, and extracting session titles from various session types, with detailed handling of session memory and response parsing.
external_methods: Agent, AgentRun, Function, Toolkit from agno.agent.agent

methods.name: format_tools
methods.description: Formats a list of tools, converting them to dictionaries based on their type, and logs warnings for unknown types.

methods.name: get_agent_by_id
methods.description: Retrieves an Agent object from a list by its agent_id.

methods.name: get_session_title
methods.description: Extracts a session title from an AgentSession or TeamSession, analyzing session data and memory.

methods.name: get_session_title_from_workflow_session
methods.description: Extracts a session title from a WorkflowSession, parsing content or response data.

methods.name: get_workflow_by_id
methods.description: Finds a Workflow object in a list by its workflow_id.

methods.name: get_team_by_id
methods.description: Finds a Team object in a list by its team_id.

methods.name: get_session_title_from_team_session
methods.description: Extracts a session title from a TeamSession, similar to the session title extraction for other session types.
